fieldUpdates.name: Set App Name

rules.description: Sets the name of the application
rules.formula:
and( $User.Override_Workflow__c = false,
or( left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Application_ChannelEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Application_TraditionalEnrollment , 15) ),
or( ischanged(Name), ischanged(RecordTypeId), ischanged( Applicant_First_Name__c ), ischanged( Applicant_Last_Name__c ), ischanged( z_Application_Date_Time__c ), ischanged( University__c ) ) )
